attributes.comment:
The increase in fees would not be so objectionable if the USCIS satellite office
in West Palm Beach, Florida operated in an efficient and humantarian manner.
Having gone through the process of fingerprinting and applying for my I-171H, I
have found the local USCIS office to be extremely slow, insensitive,
unresponsive and incompetent. Will the increase in fees lead to the hiring of
more and better trained USCIS employees? If the answer is no, then the current
fees being charged are already quite generous considering the POOR service that
adoptive parents receive from their local USCIS office.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Ana
